author: Fred Vogelstein
title: A Creator of the Ebola Vaccine Has Hope for Slowing Covid-19
description: Gary Kobinger says a vaccine targeting groups like the elderly could be ready in less than a year, and control measures are slowing the disease's spread.
content: When the late Bob Simon interviewed Gary Kobinger for 60 Minutes in 2015, Kobinger was working principally in a space suit in a special clean room behind bulletproof glass. At the time, he was a top virologist at Canadas National Microbiology Lab, where he be… [+6191 chars]
